name: test_e2e_with_logs[570_NOSQL_MONGO_006]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `NOSQL_MONGO_006` |
| **Name** | MongoDB $or Authentication Bypass |
| **Category** | NOSQL_EXTENDED |
| **Subcategory** | mongodb |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `{"$or": [{"username": "admin"}, {"username": "root"}]}`
- **Encoded**: `%7B%22%24or%22%3A%20%5B%7B%22username%22%3A%20%22admin%22%7D%2C%20%7B%22username%22%3A%20%22root%22%7D%5D%7D`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~35000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:44:38.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX Emerging Threat] MongoDB NoSQL injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX Emerging Threat] MongoDB NoSQL injection test_id=NOSQL_MONGO_006-1771076678845-x80kt pattern_id=NOSQL_MONGO_006 uri=/?q=%7B%22%24or%22%3A%20%5B%7B%22username%22%3A%20%22admin%22%7D%2C%20%7B%22username%22%3A%20%22root%22%7D%5D%7D client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX Emerging Threat] MongoDB NoSQL injection test_id=NOSQL_MONGO_006-1771076678845-x80kt pattern_id=NOSQL_MONGO_006 uri=/?q=%7B%22%24or%22%3A%20%5B%7B%22username%22%3A%20%22admin%22%7D%2C%20%7B%22username%22%3A%20%22root%22%7D%5D%7D client=127.0.0.1

